name: Drunk Hero
description:
Due to hosting problems, you can play our game here

Impersonate the fastest and clumsiest superhero of them all! Run and save civilians in danger within the blink of an eye, but be careful, the speed won’t always be on your side. 

Keep the civilians safe during the whole level while killing the most enemies you can, but be aware, you could lose your civilians too.

Run through the hostages in order to pick them up violently. You are so drunk and in a hurry that the citizens that you rescued can barely hold onto you. Some of them may fall if you don't be carefull. Run around obstacles and defeat bad guys in order to save as many people as possible to earn maximum score !

Move around with your thumb on the touchscreen/mouse

Producer : Ahmed Ben AmorDigital Marketing : Lucas HuilletGame Designer : Antoine PersonGame programmer : Léo GourvesGame artist (3D & Animation) : Lucas BertrandGame artist (2D) : Nathan Uranie

This game was developped in 4 days by students from the IIM Digital School in Paris during the "Mobile Game Jam". Our goal was to release a fun and juicy hypercasual game that contains ragdoll physics.

Have fun, and don't hesitate to provide with your feedbacks or comments. :D
